text: Suzanne Pleshette (January 31, 1937 â€“ January 19, 2008) was an American actress. She played Jeanne Greene in Youngblood Hawke in 1964. She also played Annie Hayworth in The Birds one year earlier. She also voiced characters during certain movies. She then played Emily in the sitcom The Bob Newhart Show (1972-78). Pleshette was born in Brooklyn, New York. She died from lung cancer, after an operation removed part of her lung. She was 70.Gates, Anita (January 21, 2008). "Suzanne Pleshette, 70, Newhart Actress, Dies". title: Suzanne Pleshette
